<< OOC: Unitron, you read Stephen King? Purpurfargade Ansiktet!!... >>

(No, I've seen a lot of the movies though.  I love "Sometimes They Come 
Back", and seeing "It" when you're 5 is very scary.  Have you ever read the 
book by Stephen King where it has that evil magician Flagg in it?  And the 
two sons, one fat and one locked up in a tower?  I can't remember the title)
